Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize average delivered story points across historical sprints

Name: minimize_total_estimated_effort
Description: Minimize total estimated effort of selected features in scope

Name: maximize_user_story_priority_coverage
Description: Maximize sum of priorities of implemented user stories

Name: minimize_open_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize cumulative severity of unresolved blockers

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize sprints marked as achieving their goal

Name: minimize_cycle_tasks_effort
Description: Minimize total task effort in current sprint while meeting goals

Name: minimize_wip_status_pressure
Description: Minimize count of in-progress items to reduce WIP

Name: minimize_release_slippage
Description: Minimize difference to planned release dates

Name: minimize_sprint_duration_variance
Description: Minimize variance around desired sprint duration
